  - name: Studio:GetAvailableThemes
    summary: |
      Returns a list of Class.StudioTheme|themes available in Studio.
    description: |
      The GetAvailableThemes() function returns a list of
      Class.StudioTheme|StudioThemes available in Class.Studio. You can
      access the function via:


      settings().Studio:GetAvailableThemes()

    codesamples:
      - getavailablethemes
    parameters: []
    returns:

        summary: |
          A list of themes available in Studio.

    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []

  - name: Studio.ThemeChanged
    summary: |
      Event called when Studio's Class.StudioTheme|theme changes.
    description: |
      The ThemeChanged event fires when Studio's Class.Studio.Theme|Theme
      changes. The best use of this event is to get the colors from the theme
      that changed and update your plugin's UI accordingly.

    parameters: []
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
